name: BoGazEagle
description:
Play as the Bogazeagle, a creature that can be either a Boar, a Gazelle, or an Eagle.
CONQUER (/run) THE WORLD (/forest) in this Endless Runner side-scroller.

Smash barrels, avoid traps & boulders, and complete your never-ending mission of running forever!

Controls:
1/2/3 to switch to Gazelle/Boar/Eagle

A/D or Arrow Keys while Gazelle: Move Horizontally.
Space while Gazelle: Jump forward
Space while Eagle: Get vertical boost

Backspace: Restart the level

Credits:

Programming: Lyrcaxis

Art: Haiyoooo

Sound: UndeadKangaru 

Music: nic3core
